featured.text: The children were so _____ to see the clown appear on stage that they laughed, screamed, and clapped their hands happily.

definition.zh_def: 拍手，通常表示讚賞或歡呼的行為。
definition.en_def: To strike the palms of the hands together to make a sound, often to show appreciation or approval.
definition.example: The audience began to clap after the performance.
